associationType.description:
Relationship between the modifier and the disease model. If filled out, one of the genetic or experimentalConditionsText
must also be filled out.

genetic.description: Specifies a genetic object (allele/gene) that modifies the disease model

experimentalConditionsText.description: Specifies a non-genetic object experimental condition that modifies the disease model

qualifier.description: Used to make an explicit note that the DB object is not associated with the DO term/association type
